name: The Endless Runner (Sygan)
description:
Endless Runner made as a part of a online video course on making games in Unity made by me for TechniSchools - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfIthg-_i_ONHwlLcKvanZQ

All used assets were downloaded from Unity Asset Store except for Music and SFX which are listed below and are available under an attribution licence or similar:

Music:
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod/Calming/Carefree

SFX:
https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/536108/
https://freesound.org/people/insanity54/sounds/276600/
https://freesound.org/people/Free-Rush/sounds/336932/
